mapper.select: SELECT R.idx, R.userId, U.user_name AS userName, R.productCode, R.gradePoint, R.reviewTitle, R.reviewContent, R.regDate FROM review R LEFT JOIN users U ON R.userId = U.user_id ORDER BY R.idx DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO review ( idx, userId, orderCode, productCode, gradePoint, reviewTitle, reviewContent, reviewImg, regDate ) VALUES ( #{idx}, #{userId}, #{orderCode}, #{productCode}, #{gradePoint}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewImg}, NOW() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
